item.title: Version 1.0.15
item.description:
What's New in 1.0.15

## WigiAI v1.0.15 ### Installation 1. Download `WigiAI-1.0.15.dmg` 2. Open the DMG file 3. Drag WigiAI.app to your Applications folder 4. Launch WigiAI from Applications folder **Note:** This release is code-signed and notarized by Apple for secure distribution. ### Troubleshooting If you encounter any issues opening the app: - Make sure you downloaded from the official GitHub releases page - Try redownloading if the DMG appears corrupted - Check that you're running macOS 14.0 (Sonoma) or later ### Requirements - macOS 14.0 (Sonoma) or later ### What's New - AI-powered desktop character companions - Habit tracking through conversational check-ins - Customizable characters with independent schedules - Real-time AI chat with streaming responses - Persistent chat history and context - Menubar integration - Launch on startup support - Automatic updates via Sparkle --- **Build:** 45 | **Commit:** 5f6468bc5a69ce57f1926a6f7f543e2102f249a4

View full release notes on GitHub
